channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These Chatbot Mistakes Could Cost You Customers
item.description: Chatbots have become a staple feature in many businesses’ customer service strategies, but they are not without their vulnerabilities.

item.title: ‘Quordle’ Hints And Answers For Friday, August 22
item.description: Looking for some help with today’s Quordle words? Some hints and the answers are right here to give you a hand.

item.description: Looking for some help with today's NYT Strands? An extra hint and the answers are right here to help you finish the grid and keep your streak intact.

item.title: A Smart Clothes Business For The AI Age
item.description: An example of applied AI in retail shows us how smart clothes might act in the near future.
